content.description:

Source: Adapted from Marion Goosens, “Schilders en de markt: Haarlem 1605–1635,” Ph.D. dissertation, Leiden University, 2001, 346–347.
content.question: The changing choice of subject matter by Dutch painters demonstrated in the table best reflects which of the following?

choices.label: The outlook and values of Dutch commercial and bourgeois society
The ideals of Dutch Protestant reformers
The influence of Renaissance classicism on northern European artists
The glorification of unique forms of self-expression in early modern Europe

content.answer: The outlook and values of Dutch commercial and bourgeois society

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
